title: Brand Researcher
description: Discover competitors and fetch detailed brand information including portfolios, market positions, and official domains.

brand.title: Brand(s) to Analyze
brand.description: Initial brand or list of brands to find competitors for. Can be brand names (e.g., 'Tesla', 'Coca-Cola') or URLs.

sector.title: Sector/Industry
sector.description: Sector or industry the brand operates in, e.g., 'electric cars', 'soft drinks', 'insurance'. Helps identify relevant competitors.

market.title: Geographical Market
market.description: Geographical market or region, e.g., 'Spain', 'global', 'United States'. Used to focus competitor discovery on relevant markets.

strict_competitors.title: Exclude Same Parent Company
strict_competitors.description: If true, excludes competitors from the same parent company (e.g., Fanta would NOT be considered a competitor of Coca-Cola). If false, includes all relevant competitors regardless of ownership.

instructions.title: Additional Instructions
instructions.description: Optional additional instructions to guide the competitor search. For example, you can specify to focus on direct competitors, include emerging brands, or any other specific criteria.
